131871.name: Verthandi
131871.desc: "Oh? An exciting new event? Where is it? I want to join in!"
result_desc: "Ah! The event ended so quickly! I feel like I've gotten to know you a little more today!"
"Thank you, Admin! I had a great time... Time flew by so fast. I wish we had time to chat a little longer."

"Um... I don't know how to describe it, but I feel like there's some kind of destiny between us, Admin. Don't you think? I don't quite get it right now, but I know I just want to stay with you all the time..."

131872.name: Poseidon
131872.desc: "Can I join in the event together with you today, Admin? Oh! I'm so pleased!"
result_desc: "It seems I can understand your thoughts better now. Huh? Is today's event over? Time flies so fast!"
"I had a great time today, thank you, Admin. Looking forward to our next meeting, though it would be even better if we could just chat a little longer..."
"I feel so safe and relaxed when I'm by your side, Admin... It's like we can read each other's minds without even speaking! It's amazing..."

131873.name: Tyr
131873.desc: "You hope I can make some time for you now? Sure, I happen to be free today."
result_desc: "Hey Admin, we may have our differences, but it doesn't stop us from thinking of the same battle strategies."
"It's been a good day. I'd like to continue the topic we were just discussing if possible..."
"I've never met someone who syncs so well with me, Admin."

131874.name: Hades
131874.desc: "Do you want to try it with me? Hehe, looks like you finally understand whose favor you should curry, little lamb."
result_desc: "My little lamb is trying so hard to keep up, how adorable!"
"Hehe, you've had enough already, little lamb? This amount of time is far from enough..."
"Relax and entrust everything to me, little lamb. There probably isn't anyone more suitable than you to be by my side in this world."

131875.name: Oneiroi
131875.desc: "Oh... Are you here to spend some time with me, Admin? OK..."
result_desc: "Hmm... The event is over? Thanks for reminding me, Admin... Let's play together again next time, okay...?"
"Talking to you, Admin... it makes me happy... I don't want to sleep yet... let's talk some more..."
"That's great, Admin... I feel the same, um... Actually... Every time after meeting you, Admin... I dream about you... Do you... also dream about me?"

212521.name: Verthandi
212521.desc: "Whoa, why can't I get it off? Huh, there's a note from Zenkibo... Oh, I see, this must be the 'Moment of Truth!'"

212522.name: Zhiming
212522.desc: "This'll be easy to remove without answering any questions... Wait, you want to play along? Fine..."

212523.name: Jinwu
212523.desc: "What? A bracelet that can tell if you're lying? But I'd never lie to you, Administrator! I swear!"

212524.name: Ausar
212524.desc: "I don't need a so-called 'lie detector' to prove anything. Still, it does seem kind of fun, it'd be a shame to just blow it up. Okay, I'll play your little game!"

212525.name: Mengzhang
212525.desc: "A lie detector? How intriguing! Alright then, I'll give it a whirl with you."
